children.value:
A two-dimensional array is similar to a one-dimensional array, but it can be visualised as a grid (or table)
with rows and columns. A large number of exercise and solution in two-dimensional array has been completed using C, C++ and
Java. Start your journey in two-dimensional array with C,C++ and Java programming languages.
Two Dimensional Array Program Exercise List
Write a C program to enter 3Ã—3 matrix and print it.
Write a C program to add two matrices.
Write a C program to subtract two matrices.
Write a C program to perform Scalar matrix multiplication.
Write a C program to multiply two matrices.
Write a C program to check whether two matrices are equal or not.
Write a C program to find sum of main diagonal elements of a matrix.
Write a C program to find sum of minor diagonal elements of a matrix.
Write a C program to find sum of each row and column of a matrix.
Write a C program to interchange diagonals of a matrix.
Write a C program to find upper triangular matrix.
Write a C program to find lower triangular matrix.
Write a C program to find sum of upper triangular matrix.
Write a C program to find transpose of a matrix.
Write a C program to find determinant of a matrix.
Write a C program to check Identity matrix.
Write a program in C to return only the unique rows from a given binary matrix.
Write a program in C to find maximum size square sub-matrix with all 1s.
Write a program in C to Interchange any two Rows & Columns in the given Matrix
Write a program in C to Sort Rows of the Matrix in Ascending & Columns in Descending Order
Write a program in C to Calculate the Sum of the Elements of each Row & Column
Write a program in C to Find the Frequency of Odd & Even Numbers in the given Matrix
Write a program in C to Accept a Matrix of Order MxN & Interchange the Diagonals
Write a program in C to Find the Sum of each Row & each Column of a MxN Matrix
Write a program in C to do the Sum of the Main & Opposite Diagonal Elements of a MxN Matrix
